Flash Alert - Flash App

Flash Alert is a versatile and practical application designed to keep you informed of incoming calls and messages through visual notifications. With its innovative use of your phone's flashlight, you‚Äôll never miss an important alert again, whether in a quiet room or a noisy environment.

  • Flash Notifications: Get alerted for incoming calls, SMS, and various app notifications with a customizable LED flashlight blink. üì±
  • One-Touch Flashlight: Instantly turn on your mobile's flashlight with a single touch, making it super convenient. üí°

  • Do Not Disturb Mode: Set specific times to disable flash alerts, ensuring you can focus without interruptions. üìÖ

Cons

This essential application not only serves as an effective alert system but also enriches your smartphone experience with its flashlight capabilities. Perfect for anyone who values being notified in a convenient way!
